Tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy.context: Tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy and Left superficial nasal cauterization.

Left superficial nasal cauterization.context: Tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy and Left superficial nasal cauterization.

Recurrent tonsillitis.context: Recurrent tonsillitis. Deeply cryptic hypertrophic tonsils with numerous tonsillolith. Residual adenoid hypertrophy and recurrent epistaxis.

Deeply cryptic hypertrophic tonsils.context: Recurrent tonsillitis. Deeply cryptic hypertrophic tonsils with numerous tonsillolith. Residual adenoid hypertrophy and recurrent epistaxis.

tonsillolith.context: Recurrent tonsillitis. Deeply cryptic hypertrophic tonsils with numerous tonsillolith. Residual adenoid hypertrophy and recurrent epistaxis.

Residual adenoid hypertrophy.context: Recurrent tonsillitis. Deeply cryptic hypertrophic tonsils with numerous tonsillolith. Residual adenoid hypertrophy and recurrent epistaxis.

recurrent epistaxis.context: Recurrent tonsillitis. Deeply cryptic hypertrophic tonsils with numerous tonsillolith. Residual adenoid hypertrophy and recurrent epistaxis.

Afrin.context: Afrin was instilled in both sides of the nose and allowed to take effect for a period of time.

hypertrophic tonsils.context: The hypertrophic tonsils were then removed by the suction and snare.

minimal bleeding.context: Bleeding was minimal and controlled with packing followed by electrocautery followed by extensive additional irrigation.

hypertrophic adenoids.context: An inspection of the nasopharynx confirmed that the adenoids were in fact hypertrophic rubbery cryptic and obstructive.

recurring nosebleeds.context: In light of his history of recurring nosebleeds, both sides of the nose were carefully inspected.

nasal endoscope.context: A nasal endoscope was used to identify the plexus of bleeding, which was predominantly on the left mid portion of the septum that was controlled with broad superficial cauterization using a suction cautery device.

1% Xylocaine with epinephrine.context: An additional control was established by infiltrating slowly with a 1% Xylocaine with epinephrine around the perimeter of the bleeding site and then cauterizing the bleeding site itself.

Lortab.context: Discharge will be anticipated later in the day on Lortab plus amoxicillin plus Ponaris nose drops.

amoxicillin.context: Discharge will be anticipated later in the day on Lortab plus amoxicillin plus Ponaris nose drops.

Ponaris nose drops.context: Discharge will be anticipated later in the day on Lortab plus amoxicillin plus Ponaris nose drops.
